definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: I think my brother has finally kicked the gambling habit.
sentences.chinese: 我想我哥哥算是绝对改掉牌赌的恶习啦。

sentences.english: Most cases seldom present examples of absolutely perfect or totally flawed systems.
sentences.chinese: 大部份的个案鲜有绝对完美或一无可取的情况。

sentences.english: There should definitely be no data formatting or parsing of non-standard formats.
sentences.chinese: 绝对不应对非标准格式进行数据格式化或解析。

sentences.english: All the cartons are lined with plastic sheets， so they're absolutely water-proof， I can assure you.
sentences.chinese: 所有纸箱都内衬塑料袋，我可以保证绝对防水。

sentences.english: That, at the resurrection, our bodies shall be transformed into absolutely ethereal bodies.
sentences.chinese: 复活时，我们的身体将变为绝对虚无缥渺的东西。

sentences.english: Goods of that quality will never sell.
sentences.chinese: 这样质量的商品绝对卖不出去。

sentences.english: The discipline of legionaries is absolute.
sentences.chinese: 纪律保证了军团士兵的绝对服从。

sentences.english: You don't want to inhale it, it's definitely not recommended.
sentences.chinese: 你不会想要把它吸入体内的，这是绝对不推荐的。

sentences.english: In method of thinking, absolutes and singleness must be avoided.
sentences.chinese: 在思想方法上说，应该避免绝对化，单一化。

sentences.english: We definitely appreciate the direction that the NYT is taking.
sentences.chinese: 我们绝对赞赏纽约时报的这一发展方向。

sentences.english: The triumphant orchestration inthe forth movement concludes the symphony in absolute victory.
sentences.chinese: 第四乐章的成功编曲是交响曲在绝对胜利中结束。

sentences.english: It is never my intention to be rude or to give well-meaning readers the cold shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 我绝对没有要对我的读者耍酷的意图。

sentences.english: The perylene-series products of the Company has the absolute advantage in domestic and overseas markets.
sentences.chinese: 公司产品在国内外市场具有绝对优势。

sentences.english: You and your woman have more in common than you think.
sentences.chinese: 你和你的女人有很多相似之处，这绝对超过你的想象。

sentences.english: It is definitely possible to over do it.
sentences.chinese: 这是绝对有可能做过头的事。

definition: to be certain/to be positive/assuredly/definitely/to give recognition/to affirm/affirmative (answer)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
can be rated as/can be said to be
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
